name: WHAT SHOULD WE READ/HEAR?
description:
Hi!

I'm a 3rd year student at the Art Academy of Latvia and as part of my studies I'm looking to gather some materials (written/audio/audiovisual) on topics related to design.


I am curious not only as to what you consider useful of worth to consume, but also a type of person you'd connect to what you suggest.

What could be suggested a beginner in design, probably wouldn't be to a practicing professional. Perhaps, you know of a great gateway design literature, that can grow awareness of this field in the eyes of the general public.

I think you get the idea!

Hope this sparked your interest as it has sparked mine!
